name: Long Journey
editor_name: 经历超过50周
desc: You've been in this world for a long time and are familiar with everything here.

name: Comrade of the Knights
editor_name: 骑士同盟声望达到800
desc: You become a loyal ally to the Union and decide to fight for justice together!

name: Mercenary of Iria
editor_name: 王国军声望达到800
desc: You become a loyal ally to the King's Army and are the most trusted mercenary group in Iria!

name: Tread the Path of Light
editor_name: 法皇国声望达到800
desc: You become a loyal ally to the Papal States. May the Light bless you!

name: Ever-victorious Commander
editor_name: 赢得80场战斗
desc: You've fought many difficult battles and mastered all kinds of tactics. You're on your way to becoming a great commander.

name: Unbreakable
editor_name: 击败40名粉碎者敌兵
desc: You've proven you can defeat Breakers.

name: Counter Seeker
editor_name: 击败40名突袭者敌兵
desc: You've proven you can defeat Seekers.

name: Defense Breach
editor_name: 击败40名防御者敌兵
desc: You've proven you can defeat Defenders.

name: Blind Spot
editor_name: 击败40名守望者敌兵
desc: You've proven you can defeat Watchers.

name: Terminator
editor_name: 击败40名毁灭者敌兵
desc: You've proven you can defeat Destroyers.

name: Countless Tricks
editor_name: 使用100次战术指令
desc: You actively use tactics on the battlefield and issue decisive commands to handle every situation.

name: A Flaw!
editor_name: 发起50次背后攻击
desc: You deliver devastating strikes where the enemy is most vulnerable! You're highly efficient!

name: Watch Out for Boulders!
editor_name: 推落石头对敌人造成10次伤害
desc: You're struck with inspiration just like your enemies are struck with boulders!

name: Just Fall Already!
editor_name: 从悬崖推落敌人造成15次伤害
desc: Each time you throw an enemy off a cliff, the load on your shoulders feels lighter.

name: We'll Go Home Together!
editor_name: 30场战斗无人阵亡
desc: You value your comrades and will do whatever it takes to protect them.

name: Miracle Command
editor_name: 10场战斗完全无伤
desc: Thanks to your skillful leadership, you performed countless miracles and flawlessly achieved many victories.

name: Rally Our Forces!
editor_name: 成功使用20次蓄力技能
desc: On the battlefield, one must consider the timing to fully make use of their techniques. After all, a battlefield is no place to enter half-heartedly.

name: Enemy of Iria!
editor_name: 击败60名王国军敌兵
desc: You defeated numerous King's Army soldiers, and thus became a known enemy to all of Iria.

name: Betrayer of "Justice"
editor_name: 击败60名骑士同盟敌兵
desc: You defeated numerous Union soldiers, and thus became known as an enemy of justice.

name: Abandoned by the Light
editor_name: 击败60名法皇国敌兵
desc: You defeated numerous Papal States soldiers, and thus became a foe of the Light

name: Darkness Dispelled
editor_name: 击败200名黑暗之光敌兵
desc: You defeated forces of the Darklight multiple times, and thus became known as a hero who dispelled the darkness.

name: Break Even
editor_name: 一度持有10000以上的资金
desc: The Mercenary Group endured the worst of times. From now on, when you spend money, plan accordingly.

name: Plenty of Timber
editor_name: 一度持有200以上的木
desc: The Mercenary Group has a rich stock of timber resources.

name: Plenty of Crystal Dust
editor_name: 一度持有100以上的晶尘
desc: The Mercenary Group has a rich stock of Crystal Dust resources.

name: Plenty of Iron
editor_name: 一度持有200以上的铁
desc: The Mercenary Group has a rich stock of iron mine resources.

name: Knights, Charge!
editor_name: 拥有15名骑士同盟佣兵
desc: You have fought many times alongside mercenaries of the Union for a common good.

name: Irians, Assemble!
editor_name: 拥有15名王国军佣兵
desc: Many mercenaries of the King's Army who once fought alongside you across Iria, recognize you for your valiant efforts.

name: Light, Shine on Us!
editor_name: 拥有15名法皇国佣兵
desc: Many mercenaries of the Papal States once followed you in battle and in return share your joys and sorrows as they walk in the path of light.

name: Sorcerer's Assistant
editor_name: 完成20次晶石工坊实验任务
desc: Little Sorceress Beryl has plenty of experimental needs. Only you can give her everything she wants.

name: Large Experimental Workshop
editor_name: 工坊等级升到6级
desc: At first, this place could only support basic tech research. Now, the large experiment workshop can research multiple advanced Luxite techs at once.

name: Indefatigable Mercenaries
editor_name: 完成40次派遣委托
desc: The Sword of Convallaria is constantly busy with a steady stream of incoming quests. If there's anyone in need, they know that the Sword of Convallaria can be counted on.

name: Forgemaster
editor_name: 使用40次铁匠铺
desc: The forge has full-order books thanks to the Sword of Convallaria. It seems that they want to make full use of the furnace!

name: Master of Training
editor_name: 使用50次训练场
desc: You set a strict training plan, keeping the fighting ability of your group consistently high.

name: Don't Overdo It!
editor_name: 使用60次佣兵之家
desc: Be sure to rest often before battle. Fighting without full strength can lead to ruin.

name: Armed to the Teeth
editor_name: 使用铁匠铺锻造25件装备
desc: Thanks to your prudent saving habits, you've acquired excellent gear for your group. Now go use them to your advantage!

name: Assiduous Training
editor_name: 使用训练场学到15个技能
desc: The only path to success is through training or going to battle. Through hard work and persistence can you achieve greater power.

name: Famous Mercenary Group
editor_name: 佣兵团达到40级
desc: The Sword of Convallaria is widely recognized by their clients. They are known for being efficient, committed, and dependable.

name: Widespread Reputation
editor_name: 佣兵团达到60级
desc: The Sword of Convallaria is widely known as a capable mercenary group. Their exploits have proved their worth by their countless victories time and time again.

name: Platinum Mercenary Group
editor_name: 佣兵团达到白金评级
desc: A rank that is rewarded once the Mercenary Group has reached an elite level of strength.

name: Radiant Mercenary Group
editor_name: 佣兵团达到光辉评级
desc: The highest rank only rewarded to the exceptional mercenary groups. Those who acquire the rank are undoubtedly the strongest among all mercenary groups.

name: Radiant Grace
editor_name: 完成任意赐福仪式10次
desc: Radiant blessings upon you, the dawn lights the way ahead and dispels your confusion.

name: In the Name of the Radiant
editor_name: 完成至诚庇护仪式15次
desc: With a touch of the fingertips, hope is ignited. Walk the path of the sanctuary with a sincere heart and illuminate the world in the name of Radiant.

name: Heavy Traffic
editor_name: 完成商会订单50次
desc: Complete 50 Trading Post orders in any round of Spiral of Destinies.

name: Not You Again
editor_name: 完成商会战斗30次
desc: Complete 30 Encounter Battles in any round of Spiral of Destinies.

name: Pro Team
editor_name: 派遣护卫累积80人
desc: Send 80 Guardians in total to the Caravan in any round of Spiral of Destinies.

name: Super Duper Mart
editor_name: 通过订单出售100件货物
desc: Sell 100 items via Trading Post orders in any round of Spiral of Destinies.

name: Famous Trademark
editor_name: 商会评级达到光辉级1次
desc: Reach Radiant in the Trading Post Rank in any round of Spiral of Destinies.

name: The Town of Convallaria
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《铃兰小镇》
desc: "The town ahead of us is where the Sword of Convallaria stations. It's also our home."

name: Send the Princess off
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《送行王女》
desc: I'll show the people that... The royal family doesn't just send armies to settle matters!"

name: Before the Speech
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《演讲之前》
desc:
"Wait. Your Highness, here is your Convallaria.
Its beauty suits you well. You once said that this represents your standing with Irian."

name: Waverun City Speech
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《浪涌城演讲》
desc:
"When your subjects can't live on, the mercy of the royal family...
Where is it?"

name: Waverun City News
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《浪涌城新闻》
desc: "... How could this happen? What will become of Iria?"

name: Busy Maitha
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《忙碌的麦莎》
desc: "It's not a problem since I'm doing this for everyone!"

name: Welcome Party and Farewell
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《庆功宴》
desc: "Rawiyah trusts you so much. Our mercenary group will rely on you from now on!"

name: Potion and Radiance
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《魔药或圣光》
desc:
"If your aims are true--that you intend to help, not hinder, then...
I'll be willing to turn a blind eye to the fact that you're a... sorceress."

name: Merchant in Distress
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《落难富商》
desc: "Thank you all, my saviors!"

name: Harangue
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《高谈阔论》
desc: "Equality, Negotiation, Tolerance... Only by learning from them can we become as strong as them."

name: Escort the Merchant
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《护送富商》
desc: "Therefore, I would like to hire the Sword of Convallaria for an escort back to Waverun City. I will of course pay handsomely."

name: Fatal Disease Crisis
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《救治失败》
desc: "We can only continue to do what we can... Starting with this poor soul here."

name: Song of NonoWill
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《诺诺薇儿献歌》
desc: "I'm willing to sing a song to show my apologize. What do you think?"

name: Forgotten Past
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《遗忘的曾经》
desc: "It's just people rarely sing this song. Just like they've forgotten the history..."

name: Working Maiden
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《劳作的少女》
desc: "My injury has healed. Please assign a new job to me!"

name: Real Plan
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《真正计划》
desc: "As for what comes next, I have already devised a plan to reclaim what is ours from these outsiders."

name: Drink with friends
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《把酒言欢》
desc: "You're the only one I can trust, the only one I can count on."

name: Joined Hands in the Dark
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《真情流露》
desc: "If this should be the end of my life, then I gladly face it, with you by my side."

name: Weight of Life
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《生命的重量》
desc:
"The Order came here across the sea not because we owe them, but for justice and fairness.
If Irians want to overturn tyranny, they must prepare for bloodshed."

name: Unbearable Truth
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《宴会、真相与泰登之死》
desc: "This letter will tear apart the Union and throw the entire world into turmoil, including Iria!"

name: Swear on Life
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《信念崩溃的歌洛莉亚》
desc: "But I will not betray your trust. No matter what may befall me."

name: The Final Judgement
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《最终审判》
desc:
"None could foresee the end of the war,
but there will always be people who continue to persevere and fight."

name: Calm Before the Storm
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《审判之后》
desc:
"In the end, the Iria you strive for, the one with independence and freedom,
is nothing but a mirage..."

name: Justice of the Lance
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《歌洛莉亚的救赎》
desc: For the true justice.

name: Oath of Eternity
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《奥古斯特的末路》
desc:
"Fortunately, no matter what happens,
there will always be someone stepping forward once again,
defending justice and chasing peace with their lives."

name: Fragile Trust
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《对骑士同盟的思辨》
desc: I trust my captain's judgment.

name: Death of Rawiyah
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《拉维耶之死》
desc: "Without even knowing the roots of the war, how could Irians bring an end to all this?"

name: Protect the Princess
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《王女的离开》
desc: Everyone from the Sword of Convallaria, I won't betray your trust!

name: Meet the Prince
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《觐见王子》
desc: To keep the existence of Iria, we can't go wrong.

name: Reliable Ally
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《王都觐见》
desc:
"Iria and Luccia supported each other during the war of independence.
I believe in the judgement of our reliable allies."

name: Carriage Sharing
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《共乘马车》
desc:
"Your Highness wants to confirm the true thoughts of Prince Lutfi.
No one can hide his thoughts when facing his family..."

name: Inseparable
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《手足相见》
desc:
"I think we have a covenant to be signed.
Vlder and Iria share a common destiny."

name: Substantial Help
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《帮助矿坑城》
desc: I only care about whether the people can get substantial help. Are you here for it?

name: Hard-earned Victory
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《来之不易的胜利》
desc:
"We've won the war.
The whole Iria should thank you for your efforts."

name: Peace Talks
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《和谈》
desc: Every aggressor must pay the price.

name: In Memory of Lutfi
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《悼念鲁特菲》
desc: He just wanted to be recognized by his brother.

name: Auguste's Last Words
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《奥古斯特的顽抗》
desc: "Draw your sword! Turn around and kill me yourself, Dantalion!"

name: A Dream
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《赎罪》
desc: "All I can do now... is just hope I'll wake up, and this was all a dream."

name: Failed Speech
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《演讲失败》
desc: I don't think they're trying hard enough to get my trust, so I object.

name: Warm and Glowing
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《殉情》
desc: After all, you stayed by my side till the end.

name: Successful Speech
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《演讲成功》
desc: If you are willing to join us as an equal, I'm fine with it.

name: Tacit Farewell
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《迪塔利奥之死》
desc: Thank you, Safiyyah.

name: Safiyyah's Farewell
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《最后的告别》
desc: I'm here to say goodbye today. I am going to start my own life.

name: On the Same Page
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《达成一致》
desc: ... You know what, I don't think your plans are mutually exclusive.

name: May There be No Pain in Heaven
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《愿天堂无痛苦》
desc: Mom... Dad... I'm so happy...

name: Bishop
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《枢机卿》
desc:
"Samantha is a great child, but she pushes herself too hard.
Thank you for being there with her."

name: A Moment Beyond War
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《战争之外的片刻》
desc:
"As you can see, my friend.
We are all ordinary people trapped in this uniform..."

name: Bad News
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《噩耗突临》
desc:
"Let's defeat the Union and end the war!
Together we shall fulfill her wish!
Then Rawiyah... Rawiyah... could..."

name: Behind the Mask
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《面具之下》
desc: So soft... So warm, it feels so nice...

name: The Princess' Duty
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《王女的责任》
desc:
"As the Princess of Iria, the one and only heir to the Faris throne...
I shall shoulder the responsibility for the future of all Irians."

name: Death of Hound and Eagle
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《鹰犬绝路》
desc:
"Humph... A dog... deserves... to die...
on the road... like a dog..."

name: Fly to Freedom
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《飞往自由》
desc:
"Look! The magnificent Vltar Mountain, the golden fields...
Listen to the song of May lilies in the wind...
How beautiful..."

name: Riot in the Capital
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《王都之乱》
desc:
"You destroyed Iria! You took everything from us!
All enemies must die! All enemies must die!!!"

name: Don't Cry
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《不要哭》
desc: Promise me... You must not cry...

name: If Only
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《如果当初》
desc: If we could have done things differently... Would it still be the same?

name: Original Aspiration
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《悟归初心》
desc: Grandmaster, I think... I understand now.

name: Gentleness of a Vicious Dog
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《恶犬温柔》
desc:
"Promise me... You must... live on...
Like... a child...
Live..."

name: Choice of History
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《历史的选择》
desc:
"Today, the king who shall end all misery and restore prosperity in Iria
must be chosen by none other than the Irians themselves!"

name: A Steady Glimmer
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《坚定的曙光》
desc:
"Perhaps it is a faint shimmer, perhaps it will burn out at any moment,
perhaps all it could offer is a little bit of brightness and warmth...
But that radiance in one tiny second may rekindle the longing for brightness
and revive our hope for the world..."

name: The Final Peace
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《终来的和平》
desc:
"And therefore, Samantha was officially appointed Acting Bishop 
in charge of all the affairs of the Light of Sanctuary in Iria.
Peace has finally arrived..."

name: New Start
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《重新启程》
desc:
"This is a treacherous journey. It can last forever, and you may never reach the destination. 
Are you ... sure about your choice?"

name: Godsend
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《及时雨》
desc: "Turning these shadows into reality, don't you also wish for it?" — Acambe

name: Celebration of the Trading Post Establishment
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《庆祝商会建成》
desc: "And you? You're the founder of Convallaria Trading Post, right? What drove you into entrepreneurship?" — Fancy-dressed Merchant

name: Rookie
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《新员工》
desc: "I've studied arithmetic, I can do accounting." — Inanna

name: In the Game
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《置身事内》
desc: "To slavers, we're just pieces of flesh for trade. Respect for their humanity? Why waste the effort?" — NonoWill

name: Oasis Encounter
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《绿洲邂逅》
desc: "Care to join?" — Lukamar

name: Arrival in the Oasis
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《抵达绿洲》
desc: "A bashful Irian, how intriguing…" — The Parrot Juggler

name: Homa's Coming to the Rescue
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《霍玛解围》
desc: "Hurry up and get everything back in order, and don't forget to give the car a good scrub." — Homa

name: Weird Girl
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《奇怪的少女》
desc: "I've been traveling far and wide, searching for news about my parents." — Cocoa

name: Inanna's Inquisition
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《伊南娜的诘问》
desc: "Isn't that a tad too idealistic?" — Inanna

name: Adventuring Anecdote
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《旅行的见闻》
desc: "Once, when I journeyed to Elaman, I got lost in the desert and stumbled upon a horde of monsters." — Cocoa

name: Merchant's Permit
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《行商执照》
desc: "I can't understand what you're saying! Sorry, I'm a foreigner!" — Homa

name: Convallaria Festival
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《大办铃兰节》
desc: "Open hands often bring hearts closer." — Acambe

name: Ears That Betray Secrets
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《藏不住心事的耳朵》
desc: "I'm planning to write a collection of tales, titled… Cocoa's Fantastical Adventures!" —Cocoa

name: Nickel and Dime
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《一地鸡毛》
desc: "We might as well use conflicts to our advantage, if we can't stop them altogether." — Acambe

name: Unexpected Tales
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《意料之外的故事》
desc: "Though her face eludes my memory, I'm certain I'd recognize her in an instant." — Cocoa

name: Homa's Coming to the Rescue, Once Again
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《霍玛再次解围》
desc: "The bad news is, the culprit was already a corpse when found, an arrow to the back of the head." — Homa

name: Truths and Falsehoods
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《谎言与真相》
desc: "I grew up believing the whole world mirrored my own experiences." — Acambe

name: Divergence with Acambe
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《与阿坎贝产生分歧》
desc: "To pursue my own dreams, I need my own weapon — money." — Acambe

name: Imaginary Father
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《想象中的父亲》
desc: "So, if it weren't for betrayal, he'd have surely succeeded." — Acambe

name: True Colors Revealed
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《原形毕露》
desc: "We're not so different, so why am I the one getting all the blame?" — Kadar

name: Exposure and Repentance
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《揭发与忏悔》
desc: "These badges, one for the rebel leader, the other for Mr. Kadar." — Acambe

name: Cocoa's Reaction
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《蔻蔻娜的反应》
desc: "I need more time to think it through." — Cocoa

name: 贸易协定·一
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《贸易协定·一》
desc: 鲁特菲殿下的努力……最终……哎，真可惜……——伊利亚谈判代表

name: 贸易协定·二
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《贸易协定·二》
desc: 哎，真是很久没看到两位殿下在一张桌子上用膳的画面了……——伊利亚谈判代表

name: Silent Farewell
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《无声的告别》
desc: "I wish for fewer children like me in the future…" — Cocoa

name: Reminiscing Cocoa
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《怀念蔻蔻娜》
desc: "With her gone, it feels like something's missing." — Maitha

name: A Fine Night on the Wilds
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《原野上的良夜》
desc: "Fortunately, amidst the ceaseless hustle of fame and desire, you can still find solace in the warmth of trusted friendships."

name: Bonfire in the Woods
editor_name: 经历沙盒剧情《林中烟火》
desc: "Even though life is always on the move, you can still enjoy many peaceful moments."

name: Ring-a-Ding-Ding
